        public void allocateData(int size)
        Allocate memory for the ADC data array with size data points.
        Parameters:
        size - number of samples for which to allocate memory

      • setData

        public void setData(float[] data)
        Set the complete ADC data array
        Parameters:
        data - the new data array

      • setData

        public void setData(float[] data,
           int size)
        Allocate memory for the ADC data array with size data points per channel and copy the given array into it. The size of the data array passed can be smaller or larger then the size argument.
        Parameters:
        data - the new data array to copy
        size - number of samples for which to allocate memory

      • appendData

        public void appendData(int nextSample,
              float[] data)
        Copy the given data array into the current data array starting at the given next sample
        Parameters:
        nextSample - sample index where to copy the new data array
        data - new data array
